gui.elytrautilities.config.toggleIcon.de: If enabled, an icon appears on the HUD when fall flying is disabled.
gui.elytrautilities.config.simpleTakeoff: If enabled, holding down the "Trigger Elytra" key uses a firework from inventory to takeoff.
If enabled, players can fall fly. This can also be managed in-game through the "Toggle Elytra" key.
gui.elytrautilities.config.jumpTriggerab: If enabled, fall flying can be activated by jumping in midair.
